website_summaries.verdict: This Columbia offering may be an impressive option for adventurers since it provides loads of comfort and ankle support. Moreover, its grippy outsole and lightness score well with those who have used it during a trip.On the other hand, the boot’s toe box is a cause of concern for some for being too restrictive. Overall, the Columbia Crestwood Mid Waterproof may be an excellent pair to take outdoors because of its set of strengths, as long as users get past its narrow construction.
pros: Various Columbia Crestwood Mid Waterproof reviews confirm that it is indeed a delightfully plush boot for hiking trips
A majority of outdoorsy individuals commend it for rendering sufficient ankle support
More than a bunch of hikers are glad about the surface traction of this Columbia product
According to a couple of users, the Crestwood Mid Waterproof is a lightweight boot for outdoor excursions
Droves of verified purchasers applaud the waterproofness of this footgear
A minority of outdoor enthusiasts appreciate its minimal break-in period
cons: Several shoppers say that the Columbia Crestwood Mid Waterproof’s toe box is too narrow
A few customers mention that this boot leaves a lot to be desired when it comes to breathability
Some state that its supplied lace is too short to get a secure fit from this outdoor boot

customer_reviews.title: Great value, VERY comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I live these. Best money I’ve spent on boots. I’ve worn them several times shooting and have been pretty hard on them. The are EXTREMELY comfortable and required very little (none really) break in time. I wore them around the house for about 8 hours to make sure they fit well and were comfortable and they barely fatigued my feet at all. These are well worth the money and a lot more comfortable than the Merrel’s I’ve tried which have a much higher arch and less cushion. If I can catch them on sale again I will definitely get a second pair. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Thwing

customer_reviews.title: Columbia is usually good quality, not this time
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying Columbia for the last 30 years. Used to be top shelf. Supposed to be waterproof, NOT!!!. water resistant maybe but definitely not waterproof. After less than than 2 months the upper is already starting to separate from the sole NOT HAPPY!!!! Will think twice about buying another product from Coluimbia. It's too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Renzulli

customer_reviews.title: Get a half size up and in wide!
customer_reviews.text: Finally got a pair that fit! It only took me one try after I returned the first pair I got. I took the advise of other Amazon customers and got a half size up and in wide. This should likely work for you too, as the shoes are a bit small and narrow when you order it in your usual size. I hope this helps! Anyways the shoes are super comfortable, can't wait to take them out into the field!
customer_reviews.author: Efrain A.

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a solid hiker
customer_reviews.text: Under 25 - cannot say enough about the price that I bought three pair. Columbia is a better than average build and I wear a 16 so I can go through them - they're not Danner but then again these were not $300 either.
customer_reviews.author: TES

customer_reviews.title: Sizing Issue
customer_reviews.text: The product clearly is of typical Columbia quality and durability and in the insole is supportive. The challenge starts with the sizing. After reading the reviews, I purchased this product one size larger, in wide, than I do for all other footwear thinking that it would be fine. When I first tried them on, they were very snug with a rather thin sock but I assumed it would stretch as time has went by. That has not happened and my toes are pinched. I don't think that you can go wrong with price or quality of this product but the sizing is something to consider. I'd suggest, at minimum, to go up 1.5 sizes larger than you usually purchase.
customer_reviews.author: DAVID M MCKENNEY

customer_reviews.title: Revised review
customer_reviews.text: Good quality shoe. Fit is ok but a little small for a wide shoe size. Like the design and internal support. Just wish they were a little wider and 1/2 size larger. A customer asked where they are made. i answered USA but Columbia is a USA company however the shoes are manufactured in Vietnam.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Great hiking boots
customer_reviews.text: These boots were a life saver in Colorado’s Rocky Mountains. I hiked up a mountain in the snow for 7 hours and my feet did not get wet. I didn’t have any blisters or discomfort after the hike. There were a few times where I stepped on the wrong stone and the boots kept me from rolling my ankle. These are great hiking boots and they’re comfortable. I’m happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nels

customer_reviews.title: These deserve better than 4 stars!
customer_reviews.text: So far, these are one of my most favorite boots from Columbia. They are VERY comfortable, fairly lightweight, provide excellent traction and stability. The waterproofing is good too. The sizing was perfect (not sure why others here have complaints).
customer_reviews.author: F

customer_reviews.title: Very nice...
customer_reviews.text: Very Nice shoes I use to buy shoes from Cabelas but they went so high but these are priced right so I got them I love these shoes I have something under my feet thanks Cabelas for pricing Of these shoes....
customer_reviews.author: Floyd

customer_reviews.title: Not wide.....not true to size
customer_reviews.text: BUYER BEWARE. Ive had several Columbias over the years. 13 Wide in ever pair. That leaves room for extra socks and comfort. So I ordered 13 wide in this style. Wow what a joke. I saw it said it runs small. But these were more like a 12 regular. Definalty not wide......very narrow. Could barely get on and when on they were crushing my feet and toes.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Lydem

customer_reviews.title: Runs small from other Columbia shoes
customer_reviews.text: Had ordered the same size as another pair of Columbia shoes I had that fit great, size 11 regular. Could not even get this style on at that size, ordered an 11w and they went on but were snug. I mistakenly thought they would loosen up as the padding on them is thick. They did not, I would order a full size larger.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comforable and well made
customer_reviews.text: This was a new design of what I have been buying for years. There a definitely more waterproof then then to others. They did feel a little tighter then expected, they loosened up a bit but were still a little more snug. Still they are very comfortable to wear all day.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Dziuk

customer_reviews.title: Quality boot at affordable price
customer_reviews.text: Great product very comfortable for long hikes added some waterproofing spray and had no issues with water They dried very quickly when I was walking through some small creeks as well ( don’t know what people expect with waterproofing if you complete dryness buy hip waders) Will say they don’t seem like the most durable thing ever I haven’t had any issues and have worn them on multiple long hikes but time will tell I guess. I would certainly recommend these to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Columbia quality
customer_reviews.text: As with pretty much everything Columbia makes, these are great! Bought them for my wife. Took one short hike to break in and now sh loves the comfort and support. Plus we tested the waterproofing by walking through a shallow stream and they held up completely.
customer_reviews.author: Clannen

customer_reviews.title: Wish they were built better
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in mid July. Haven’t worn them anywhere extreme and traveled less than 10 miles in them. Bottom sole on the left foot coming undone. Thought I’d at least get a good 100 miles before anything bad happened. But no. Wish I could exchange them or get some kind of manufacturers defect warranty on them cause they’re so comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Boom I did it.

customer_reviews.title: Anything but Waterproof
customer_reviews.text: *BUYER BEWARE* I bought these boots for hiking and hunting in the Pacific Northwest mainly because they are advertised as "waterproof". They are anything but waterproof. I've worn them 3 times and yes they are comfortable at first but less than a mile into the hike my feet were soaked. Socks could be wrung out like a sponge. It wasn't even raining!?! Just the dew on the ground. Highly disappointed and will be buying new boots.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality, less than a week old and a few hikes around the campground and the toe bumper is already separating. Find a better product.
customer_reviews.author: Need Light

customer_reviews.title: Bad Sizing, Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: I saw this for nearly 50% off and thought it was a great deal. I never bought Columbia and heard it was great. Sadly the shoe said "16," but it fits like it was "14". I wear a size 15 shoe and knew I had to buy one size bigger. I was shocked when my food couldn't fit in. I compared it to my Rockford boots, and they looked like giants next to these. Beware of the sizing. Something is off.
customer_reviews.author: Myron David

customer_reviews.title: fit nice came quickly
customer_reviews.text: The only thing that would make them nicer would two sets of hooks at the top instead of one. So you can tighten the laces better
customer_reviews.author: Alan A. Grust

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and comfortable right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Boots were true to size and didn’t require a break-in period. The fee stable and gripped both smooth and loose trails well.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Stout

customer_reviews.title: Cheap shoes....
customer_reviews.text: Definitely NOT waterproof in the slightest. Not holding up great either. You get what ya pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great boots!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband and he continues to RAVE about them. He has a wide foot so I made sure to get the wide- perfect fit and very functional. He is wearing them every chance he gets. I like the way they look too- not too hulky.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Ott

customer_reviews.title: Real Columbia, Unreal Price!
customer_reviews.text: In my country, original Columbia these cost 250% more. This is surely a bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.author: Y

customer_reviews.title: Too narrow
customer_reviews.text: Great boot, but did receive wrong size therefore will be returning. I did request a wide but a medium width was delivered.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. E.

customer_reviews.title: No grip what so ever
customer_reviews.text: We got these for our son. They are shoo slick, he wore them the first time, stepped on a small amount of mud (hence the mud all over the shoes) and feel, completely messing himself up. He's got bruises all over himself now and a giant knot on his leg. You'd think a hiking boot would have a slight grip.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Really Waterproof!!
customer_reviews.text: Great buy. THIS ARE DEF WATERPROOF. My husband loves them. He works 12hr shifts as a bouncer. You will need to buy them a size and half larger.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for winter disc golf
customer_reviews.text: I wear these for disc golf and they are a great shoe. Good grip, great support, and they feel good after 4 hours of hiking.
customer_reviews.author: blender kitties

customer_reviews.title: Unusual fitment near the toes.
customer_reviews.text: Decent quality but this particular model of Columbia shoe is quite narrow across the top of the foot near the toes. I have other Columbia boots where this is not so. They stretch a little in use, but remain somewhat tight.
customer_reviews.author: J. Painter

customer_reviews.title: Comodas y livianas
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and light, in terms of size,buy half number plus if you're going to be mountain hike
customer_reviews.author: Ramon Rodríguez

customer_reviews.title: Good Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Shoe is very light and a great fit. very comfortable. No break-in needed.
customer_reviews.author: H. M. Sowell

customer_reviews.title: a Little tight in the Toe area
customer_reviews.text: I am enjoying my new boots but the are snug in the tor area. I hope they will stretch as I wear them.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Fuerstenau

customer_reviews.title: felt 2 sizes to small
customer_reviews.text: I bought a 10W low rise and mid rise at the same time. The mid rise is a solid size to small. not in length but in laces to sole. So tight the ball of my foot ached just walking around the house.
customer_reviews.author: jon

customer_reviews.title: Just add 3 to your shoe size to start (Run small and narrow)
customer_reviews.text: I go to Wal-Mart and get 10 1/2 W and it all good. So thay run small so I got a 11 and sent them back and got a 12 W now I have sent them back too get the 13W . Run small ~~~~ just tooooo small (-:
customer_reviews.author: J C

customer_reviews.title: Slightly undersize
customer_reviews.text: Size feels a little tight, hoping that they loosen up a little more after wearing for a couple weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Run small
customer_reviews.text: Apparently these run small. Wore them for 6 hours and the sole detached from the shoe. Not work it even for the price.
customer_reviews.author: S. B.

customer_reviews.title: Warning
customer_reviews.text: After 2 months The back of the sole pulled away from the show Looks like the adhesive was ineffective.
customer_reviews.author: Jess Jacobson

customer_reviews.title: Ugly as hell but a comfortable shoe!
customer_reviews.text: They have held up well to 60 hours a week 3 months as a handyman!
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Burkes

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: They were a gift- maybe the last gift- for my grandson who never thanked me but wears them to work everyday.
customer_reviews.author: JoEllen Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Should have believed the reviews
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the same size 10W I had in another Columbia boot which I loved and I can barely get my feet in the boot. I am returning. Believe the reviews, these are not true to size
customer_reviews.author: Kristi D.

customer_reviews.title: Glad to find boots in bigger sizes
customer_reviews.text: They are good looking boots. They seem a little tighter than my normal shoes. Hopefully they will loosen up a little bit. Will be seeing how they hold up with everyday wear.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Size problem
customer_reviews.text: I bought 12 size and I felt it a little biit small. Then I exchanged for 13 and ...too big. Finally I'm using 12, not really confortable. I hope that on a couple of weeks feel it better.
customer_reviews.author: Esteban Agosin

customer_reviews.title: This is a Great shoe --
customer_reviews.text: It fits nice -- comfortable -- has great Quality -- and the price is right too
customer_reviews.author: marie

customer_reviews.title: Go up a show size.
customer_reviews.text: Great fit but had to go up a size. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Very small.
customer_reviews.text: This was supposed to be a wide but it wasn't even close.
customer_reviews.author: Rich K.

customer_reviews.title: look good
customer_reviews.text: fit perfect and looks good, be sure to spray them with water sealer to protect the color
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Sizing way off
customer_reviews.text: So small I could not get my into the boot.
customer_reviews.author: Basementboy

customer_reviews.title: Great boot
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe. Grips on steep Rocky slopes and sticks well to downhill slick rock . Nice hardy sole so rocks don't bother the feet at all. Get them a half size larger than normal size as most run a little small.
customer_reviews.author: michael king

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!!
customer_reviews.text: You can’t go wrong with these. I do grounds work and on my feet a lot and these hold up very well. Great comfort and your feet don’t get wet like you think they might walking through a puddle or wet grass!! All around a great boot.
customer_reviews.author: Jaquay Pounds

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and getting g the right fit!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a size larger and they fit perfect, giving me room for another insole and thick socks. Also ordered wide. Love the boots, well made!
customer_reviews.author: Don McSheehy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, but time will tell. Hopefully they hold up for my elk hunt.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: last pair lasted 15 years
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent for working around the house on soggy grounds, and for hiking. They simply dont wear out!
customer_reviews.author: Edward Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: These boots are a lot of things. Waterproof is NOT one of them. Otherwise good.
customer_reviews.author: VB

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful boot
customer_reviews.text: The size 10 didn't fit as expected, but he loves the 10.5.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great VFM
customer_reviews.text: Good shoes, Fits well. I wear it almost everyday for 2 months, shows no signs of wear.
customer_reviews.author: Shahar Peretz

customer_reviews.title: Confortable daily boots
customer_reviews.text: Excellent boots, I love this brand and it’s super great this model.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Gallardo

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, No Pinches.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable shoe that doesn't pinch anywhere. Would recommend. Good price. Good Size 16 shoes that are hard to find at a decent price.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Jay Rakhra

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: i will be making a return on these today, they are to narrow and to short.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Columbia's I've owned.
customer_reviews.text: Have had them for 3 months. Wear them daily, but you can't tell. Other than dirt, still look new. Are wearing very well. Fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: sterling

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and warm.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and fits well, pulls my socks sometimes tight, but after you adjust it's a great pair of boots.
customer_reviews.author: Scott C Loyd

customer_reviews.title: Columbia shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes, the are very comfortable. It rained like cats n dogs yesterday, and my feet stayed dry. I will definitely be ordering another pair
customer_reviews.author: shaun crocker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Haven't wore them on the trail yet, but I have worn them around work to break them in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Gave to someone that needed shoes and he said they were very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: LeAnn Porter

customer_reviews.title: Excellent boot. Inexpensive too.
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased. Comfortable. Easy break in. Solid support for backpacking. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: ETM

customer_reviews.title: Not over priced
customer_reviews.text: Boots are great if u have wide feet they are for you
customer_reviews.author: Harry Smith

customer_reviews.title: The size 15 are the exact size of what i wear.
customer_reviews.text: So far nothing. They are amazingly comfortable and light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Jonah Hedeen

customer_reviews.title: Certainly not waterproof.. feet get wet just walking ...
customer_reviews.text: Certainly not waterproof .. feet get wet just walking in heavy dew..
customer_reviews.author: Harold Washington

customer_reviews.title: I need to look at how dirty they got
customer_reviews.text: My sons feet keep growing. Any chance of returning them? He wore them once to paint ball. I need to look at how dirty they got.
customer_reviews.author: Dwight Blickensderfer

product_meta.title: Columbia Men's Crestwood Mid Waterproof Hiking Shoe
product_meta.description: A lightweight and durable waterproof shoe designed for multiple activities on the trail..
feature_bullets: Techlite lightweight midsole for long lasting comfort, superior cushioning, and high energy return
Combination upper featuring leather, mesh and webbing
